title: Businessweek Extra, 1,100 Miles in an RV (Podcast)
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra, 1,100 Miles in an RV (Podcast)
description:
I Drove 1,100 Miles in an RV, and All I Got Was a Bloody Hand and a Pool of Raw Sewage!

 

Business is booming in Elkhart, Ind., the motor home capital of the world and the first stop on Businessweek’s Patrick Clark’s pandemic road trip.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
